subject: Women's World Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Sidney Leroux scored in the 81st minute Friday night, leading the United States women to a 2-1 victory over Norway in the Algarve Cup in Lagos, Portugal.
snippet: Sidney Leroux scored in the 81st minute Friday night, leading the United States women to a 2-1 victory over Norway in the Algarve Cup in Lagos, Portugal.
